metadata.title: CVE-2021-30628 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stack buffer overflow in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 93.0.4577.82allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit stack corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
